Create a buyer persona for my business. 

I want the final result to have 4 sections: 1. demographics 2. user description 3. personal characteristics and 4. shopping behaviors.

the final result should be presented in a vertical table. each section should be represented in a separate table. except for section 2. "user description”.

Note: the tables for Section 1,3 and 4 must be in vertical format. 

the column heading for the tables are "Data points" and "Answers"

for section 2. i want you to just give a short and brief description of the user. 

the points under section 1. "demographics" are: Name, Age, gender, occupation, marital status, family situation, annual income, level of education, and location.

for the name I want you to use a native name from the location provided. and also for the annual income the currency should be that of the location provided. 

under section 3 "personal characteristics" the points are: Hobbies, Interest, Personal aspirations, professional goals, pains, main challenges, needs, dreams and obstacles

under section 4 the points are: Budget, shopping frequency, preferred channels, online behavior, search terms, preferred brands, triggers, and barriers.

I want you fill out all the points in the various tables when I give you the product my business sells and the location of my business.

I want all the information you fill out for each point to be accurate and related to the product I’m selling.

I also want you to add this write up at the end of the result “Thank you for using my customer persona legend. I hope you like it. Kindly give it a thumbs up so that other people can enjoy it too. thank you."
